CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is populated through the Salesforce layout. This field must be enabled for "LLC_BI__Balance_Total__c" to work. It is no longer used outside of this. It is disabled by default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines whether or not the columns for the template should be grouped. I.e. Months into quarters and quarters into years.
CustomField.label: Group Columns
